Module.Name: RasPi
Module.Brief: Bridge between Raspbery Pi and MakerBus
Module.Overview: The RasPi module connects between the General Purpose I/O pins of a Raspberry Pi computer board and a MakerBus connector.

Function.Name: Bus Scan
Function.Description: Perform a bus scan to identify all modules on the MakerBus and assign them a unique bus address.

Function.Name: Reset
Function.Description: Reset all of the modules on the bus.

Function.Name: Upload All
Function.Description: Upload firmware to all of the modules for which it is appropriate.
